* is an [animal](/wiki/Animal "Animal").
* is [carnivorous](/wiki/Carnivore "Carnivore").
* is not a valid [polymorphable](/wiki/Polymorph "Polymorph") form.
* is a [lord to its kind](/wiki/M2_LORD "M2 LORD").
* is male.
* is normally generated [hostile](/wiki/Hostile "Hostile").
* is [strong](/wiki/Strong "Strong").
* has [infravision](/wiki/Infravision "Infravision").
* can be seen through [infravision](/wiki/Infravision "Infravision"). |                                                                                                   |

**Drauglir**, d, is a [defunct](/wiki/Defunct_features_\(SpliceHack\) "Defunct features (SpliceHack)") unique [monster](/wiki/Monster "Monster") in [SpliceHack](/wiki/SpliceHack "SpliceHack"). He was encountered in **The Dark Forest**. Unlike most [lycanthropes](/wiki/Lycanthropes "Lycanthropes"), Drauglir did not have a human form. When he would normally shift into [humanoid](/wiki/Humanoid "Humanoid") form, he kept his own shape, but gained hit points, woke up (if asleep), and could move again, as if he had undergone a transformation.

## Messages

- The fur of Drauglir ripples.

  Drauglir "transformed" in view of the player.

* *This page is a **[stub](/wiki/Category:Stubs "Category:Stubs")**. Should you wish to do so, you can contribute by [**expanding this page**.](https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Drauglir\&action=edit)*

Drauglir

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search
d Drauglir
Difficulty 17
Attacks Bite 5d8 lycanthropy, Claw 1d6 sticky
d Drauglir
Difficulty 17
Attacks

Bite 5d8 lycanthropy, Claw 1d6 sticky

Base level 15
Base experience 331
Speed 15
Base AC 0
Base MR 40
Alignment 0 (neutral)
Frequency (by normal means) Unique
Genocidable No
Weight 1000
Nutritional value 350
Size Large
Resistances None
Resistances conveyed None

Drauglir:

  • has no hands.
  • is an animal.
  • is carnivorous.
  • is not a valid polymorphable form.
  • is a lord to its kind.
  • is male.
  • is normally generated hostile.
  • is strong.
  • has infravision.
  • can be seen through infravision.

Drauglir, d, is a defunct unique monster in SpliceHack. He was encountered in The Dark Forest. Unlike most lycanthropes, Drauglir did not have a human form. When he would normally shift into humanoid form, he kept his own shape, but gained hit points, woke up (if asleep), and could move again, as if he had undergone a transformation.

Messages

The fur of Drauglir ripples.
Drauglir "transformed" in view of the player.
This page is a stub. Should you wish to do so, you can contribute by expanding this page.

'''Drauglir''', {{magenta|d}}, is a [[defunct features (SpliceHack)|defunct]] unique [[monster]] in [[SpliceHack]]. He was encountered in '''The Dark Forest'''. Unlike most [[lycanthropes]], Drauglir did not have a human form. When he would normally shift into [[humanoid]] form, he kept his own shape, but gained hit points, woke up (if asleep), and could move again, as if he had undergone a transformation.
